commit.message:
rustbuild: Add rustbook/standalone doc support

This commit implements documentation generation of the nomicon, the book, the
style guide, and the standalone docs. New steps were added for each one as well
as appropriate makefile targets for each one as well.

files.patch:
@@ -24,3 +24,15 @@ all:
 
 clean:
 	$(Q)$(BOOTSTRAP) --clean
+
+docs: doc
+doc:
+	$(Q)$(BOOTSTRAP) --step doc
+style:
+	$(Q)$(BOOTSTRAP) --step doc-style
+nomicon:
+	$(Q)$(BOOTSTRAP) --step doc-nomicon
+book:
+	$(Q)$(BOOTSTRAP) --step doc-book
+standalone-docs:
+	$(Q)$(BOOTSTRAP) --step doc-standalone
